data.homeworkTitle: （儿科护理学）第七章 消化系统疾病患儿的护理
data.remark: 主观题是为了凑够100分的，大家按课本写就得了，不需要在意系统给没给分。大家在规定时间里完成

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"脱水已纠正","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"血容量已恢复","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"输人液体中电解质液过多","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"输人液体中电解质液过少","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"不能补含钾液体","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"0.2%-0.3%","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"0.3%-0.5%","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"0.5%-1.0%","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"1.0%-1.5%","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"1.5%-3.0%","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 等渗性脱水
questions.answer: 水钠等比例丢失，脱水后体内血清钠离子浓度在130~`150mmol/L之间；此类型小儿腹泻中最常见。
questions.studentAnswer: 水钠等比例丢失，脱水后体内血清钠离子浓度在。130~150mmol/l，小儿腹泻
